True, we have some troubles when we start rpging, and
congratulations Allora, you're a great rpger.

--- Yanshosh@... wrote:
> Its been great RPing with you this last year,
> Alloran! And don't
> worry, everyone gets off to a shaky start (you
> should have seen me
> starting out).
> 
> 
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@y..., Alloran2@a... wrote:
> > OOC: It's April 3rd, a day that seems ordinary to
> most of you, but
> not for 
> > me.  Today was the day, 1 year ago, that i joined
> this RPG.  I had
> been doing 
> > searches all over the internet for RPGs, but none
> really caught my
> eye until 
> > i saw the link- Neo Beast Wars RPG. I decided id
> like to check it
> out, and 
> > fell in love as soon as i read the story and
> looked at the
> characters.  I 
> > knew i must join immeadiately, so i used an old
> favorite character,
> Torca.  
> > My profile was an immeadiate mode, and i was
> pretty stupid when i
> was new.  I 
> > remember my first post like it was yesterday. 
> Torca burst into the
> Predacon 
> > base and put his gun up to Quickstrike and tried
> to eliminate his
> spark.  
> > Talon got really pissed at me.  But soon i started
> to catch on, and
> created 
> > stronger characters and some good stories.  In my
> time here in the
> RPG, i saw 
> > many changes.  I've seen ultra-powerful groups
> rise and fall,
> extremely 
> > talented RPers come and go(not to mention a lot of
> idiots), and
> built 
> > firendships with members.  Id like to thank
> Soulstice for his
> friendship and 
> > partnership, Zardus for putting up with me through
> my early times,
> and 
> > everyone else that ive had the pleasure(or
> displeasure) of RPing
> with, and i 
> > hope my next year here will be even better.  Just
> wanted to get that
> off my 
> > chest.
> 
>
